==Abilities==
===Stance-Independent===
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy = Pacal
|name_1      = Headspin
|desc_1      = Performs headspins while moving towards the player, dealing '''85% ATK''' as {{Color|Geo DMG}} upon contact.
}}

===Unarmed Stance===
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy = Pacal

|name_1      = Kick
|desc_1      = Performs a kick, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.

|name_2      = Roundhouse Kick
|desc_2      = Performs a single spinning kick, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.

|name_3      = Triple Kick
|desc_3      = Performs 3 consecutive spinning kicks, each dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}. The last kick covers a wider range and causes heavy [[Displacement|knockback]].

|name_4      = Flying Kick
|desc_4      = Performs a flying kick, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.

|name_5      = Taunt
|desc_5      = Quickly shuffling his feets position before hand gesturing the player to come. The taunt is quick but it still leaves Pacal vulnerable.
}}

===Hammer Stance===
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy = Pacal

|desc_1 = After reaching '''~50%''' of his max [[HP]], Pacal will brandish the hammer on his back. Allowing him to perform different attacks.

|name_2      = Hammer Swing
|desc_2      = Swings his hammer for a quick close-range attack, dealing '''100% ATK''' with a sideways swing or '''75% ATK''' with a downward cleave as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
|caption_2 = Sideways Swing
|file_2_2 = Pacal Hammer Swing 2
|caption_2_2 = Downward Cleave

|name_3 = Rapid Swing Charge
|desc_3 = Becomes visibly angry before charging at the player, swinging his hammer wildly, dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} with each hit and charging in twice before exhausting himself in the process. Leaving him open to further attacks as he tries to catch a breather.

|name_4      = Taunt
|desc_4      = Taunts the player by either raising his hammer up, pumping his arms and gesturing a shouting motion at them, or by flexing his arm. Leaving himself vulnerable in the process.
|file_4 = Pacal Taunt 3
|caption_4 = Version 1
|file_4_2 = Pacal Taunt 4
|caption_4_2 = Version 2
|file_4_3 = Pacal Taunt 2
|caption_4_3 = Version 3
}}
